verses.text: Let God arise! Let \w his|strong="H1732"\w* enemies \w be|strong="H1732"\w* scattered! Let them who hate \w him|strong="H1732"\w* \w also|strong="H1732"\w* flee before \w him|strong="H1732"\w*.

\w As|strong="H6440"\w* smoke \w is|strong="H6440"\w* \w driven|strong="H5127"\w* \w away|strong="H5127"\w*, \w so|strong="H6965"\w* \w drive|strong="H6327"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w away|strong="H5127"\w*. \w As|strong="H6440"\w* wax melts \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* fire, \w so|strong="H6965"\w* let \w the|strong="H6440"\w* wicked perish \w at|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* God.

\w But|strong="H7563"\w* let \w the|strong="H6440"\w* righteous \w be|strong="H7563"\w* glad. Let \w them|strong="H6440"\w* rejoice \w before|strong="H6440"\w* God. Yes, let \w them|strong="H6440"\w* rejoice \w with|strong="H6440"\w* gladness.

Sing \w to|strong="H6440"\w* God! Sing praises \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* name! Extol \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w who|strong="H6662"\w* rides \w on|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* clouds: \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*,\f + \fr 68:4 \ft Hebrew: יה Yah\f* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* name! \w Rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*!

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* father \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* fatherless, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* defender \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* widows, \w is|strong="H8034"\w* \w God|strong="H3050"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* holy habitation.

God sets \w the|strong="H6944"\w* lonely \w in|strong="H4583"\w* families. He brings out \w the|strong="H6944"\w* prisoners \w with|strong="H6944"\w* singing, but \w the|strong="H6944"\w* rebellious dwell \w in|strong="H4583"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sun-scorched land.

God, \w when|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H3318"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H3427"\w* \w your|strong="H3318"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w*, \w when|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H3318"\w* \w marched|strong="H3318"\w* \w through|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* wilderness... \qs Selah.\qs*

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* earth trembled. \w The|strong="H6440"\w* sky \w also|strong="H5971"\w* poured \w down|strong="H6440"\w* rain \w at|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* God \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Sinai— \w at|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* God, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* God \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w You|strong="H6440"\w*, \w God|strong="H8064"\w*, sent \w a|strong="H3068"\w* plentiful rain. \w You|strong="H6440"\w* confirmed \w your|strong="H6440"\w* inheritance \w when|strong="H3478"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* weary.

\w Your|strong="H3559"\w* congregation lived therein. \w You|strong="H5159"\w*, God, \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w your|strong="H3559"\w* goodness \w for|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* poor.

\w The|strong="H3559"\w* Lord announced \w the|strong="H3559"\w* word. \w The|strong="H3559"\w* \w ones|strong="H2896"\w* \w who|strong="H3427"\w* proclaim \w it|strong="H3559"\w* \w are|strong="H2896"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H2896"\w* \w company|strong="H2416"\w*.

“Kings \w of|strong="H6635"\w* \w armies|strong="H6635"\w* flee! \w They|strong="H5414"\w* flee!” She \w who|strong="H7227"\w* waits \w at|strong="H5414"\w* home divides \w the|strong="H5414"\w* plunder,

\w while|strong="H1004"\w* \w you|strong="H4428"\w* sleep amongst \w the|strong="H2505"\w* camp fires, \w the|strong="H2505"\w* wings \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dove sheathed \w with|strong="H1004"\w* silver, her feathers \w with|strong="H1004"\w* shining gold.
\w When|strong="H7901"\w* \w the|strong="H7901"\w* Almighty scattered kings \w in|strong="H7901"\w* \w her|strong="H7901"\w*, it snowed \w on|strong="H7901"\w* Zalmon.

\w The|strong="H6566"\w* mountains \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Bashan \w are|strong="H4428"\w* majestic mountains. \w The|strong="H6566"\w* mountains \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Bashan \w are|strong="H4428"\w* rugged.

Why do \w you|strong="H2022"\w* look \w in|strong="H2022"\w* envy, \w you|strong="H2022"\w* rugged \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, \w at|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H2022"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* where God chooses \w to|strong="H2022"\w* reign? Yes, \w the|strong="H2022"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*\f + \fr 68:16 \ft LORD or GOD in all caps is from the Hebrew יהוה Yahweh except when otherwise noted as being from the short form יה Yah.\f* \w will|strong="H2022"\w* dwell \w there|strong="H2022"\w* forever.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* chariots \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* tens \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thousands \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thousands \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thousands. \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* amongst \w them|strong="H3427"\w*, \w from|strong="H3068"\w* Sinai, into \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sanctuary.

You \w have|strong="H6944"\w* ascended \w on|strong="H7393"\w* high. You \w have|strong="H6944"\w* led away captives. You \w have|strong="H6944"\w* received \w gifts|strong="H6944"\w* amongst people, yes, amongst \w the|strong="H6944"\w* rebellious also, \w that|strong="H6944"\w* \w the|strong="H6944"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*\f + \fr 68:18 \ft Hebrew: יה Yah\f* God might dwell there.

Blessed be \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3050"\w*, who daily bears \w our|strong="H3947"\w* burdens, even \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w God|strong="H3050"\w* who \w is|strong="H4791"\w* \w our|strong="H3947"\w* salvation. \qs Selah.\qs*

God \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w deliverance|strong="H3444"\w*. \w To|strong="H3117"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*,\f + \fr 68:20 \ft When rendered in ALL CAPITAL LETTERS, “LORD” or “GOD” is the translation of God’s Proper Name (Hebrew “\+wh יהוה\+wh*”, usually pronounced Yahweh).\f* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* Lord, belongs escape \w from|strong="H3117"\w* death.

But \w God|strong="H3069"\w* \w will|strong="H3069"\w* strike through \w the|strong="H3069"\w* head \w of|strong="H4194"\w* his enemies, \w the|strong="H3069"\w* hairy scalp \w of|strong="H4194"\w* such \w a|strong="H3068"\w* one as still continues \w in|strong="H4194"\w* his guiltiness.

\w The|strong="H1980"\w* Lord said, “\w I|strong="H1980"\w* will \w bring|strong="H1980"\w* \w you|strong="H1980"\w* again \w from|strong="H1980"\w* Bashan, \w I|strong="H1980"\w* will \w bring|strong="H1980"\w* \w you|strong="H1980"\w* again \w from|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* depths \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* sea,

\w that|strong="H7725"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w may|strong="H7725"\w* crush \w them|strong="H7725"\w*, dipping \w your|strong="H7725"\w* foot \w in|strong="H7725"\w* blood, \w that|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* tongues \w of|strong="H3220"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* dogs \w may|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H1316"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* portion \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* enemies.”

\w They|strong="H7272"\w* \w have|strong="H7272"\w* seen \w your|strong="H4480"\w* processions, God, even \w the|strong="H4480"\w* processions \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* God, \w my|strong="H4480"\w* \w King|strong="H4616"\w*, \w into|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* sanctuary.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* singers \w went|strong="H4428"\w* \w before|strong="H7200"\w*, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* minstrels followed \w after|strong="H7200"\w*, amongst \w the|strong="H7200"\w* ladies playing \w with|strong="H4428"\w* tambourines,

“Bless God \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* congregations, even \w the|strong="H8432"\w* Lord \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* assembly \w of|strong="H8432"\w* Israel!”

\w There|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* little Benjamin, \w their|strong="H3068"\w* ruler, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* princes \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Judah, \w their|strong="H3068"\w* council, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* princes \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Zebulun, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* princes \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Naphtali.

\w Your|strong="H8033"\w* God \w has|strong="H3063"\w* commanded \w your|strong="H8033"\w* strength. Strengthen, God, \w that|strong="H3063"\w* \w which|strong="H8033"\w* you \w have|strong="H3063"\w* done \w for|strong="H8033"\w* us.
Because \w of|strong="H6466"\w* \w your|strong="H6680"\w* temple \w at|strong="H6680"\w* Jerusalem, kings \w shall|strong="H5797"\w* bring presents \w to|strong="H6680"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w*.

Rebuke \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wild animal \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* reeds, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* bulls \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* calves \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* peoples. Trample \w under|strong="H5921"\w* foot \w the|strong="H5921"\w* bars \w of|strong="H4428"\w* silver. Scatter \w the|strong="H5921"\w* nations \w who|strong="H4428"\w* delight \w in|strong="H5921"\w* war.

Princes \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w come|strong="H5971"\w* out \w of|strong="H5971"\w* Egypt. Ethiopia \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* hurry \w to|strong="H5971"\w* stretch out her hands \w to|strong="H5971"\w* God.

Sing \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w*, \w you|strong="H4480"\w* kingdoms \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* earth! Sing praises \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* Lord—\qs Selah—\qs*

\w to|strong="H4467"\w* him \w who|strong="H7891"\w* rides on \w the|strong="H2167"\w* heaven \w of|strong="H4467"\w* heavens, which \w are|strong="H4467"\w* \w of|strong="H4467"\w* old; \w behold|strong="H7891"\w*, he utters \w his|strong="H7891"\w* voice, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* mighty voice.

\w Ascribe|strong="H5414"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w*! \w His|strong="H5414"\w* excellency \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w over|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israel|strong="H8064"\w*, \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w in|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* skies.

\w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* awesome, \w God|strong="H5414"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* sanctuaries. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w gives|strong="H5414"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w power|strong="H5797"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* people. Praise \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w*!
